43006067	Runacuna sayno aywacuyaptinmi chunca ishcay (12) acrashgan cag discïpuluncunata Jesús nergan: “¿Gamcunapis paycunano aywacuytacu munaycäyanqui?”
43006068	Saymi Simón Pedro nergan: “Gloriaman aywayänäpä shumag yachaycäsiyämaptiquega ¿imata ashirtä maypapis aywayäman, taytay?
43006069	Nogacunaga criyiyämi Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashgayquita.”
43006070	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Chunca ishcay (12) acrashgan cag discïpulöcuna cayänayquipäga nogami gamcunata acrashcä. Sayno captinpis gamcunapita jucmi diablo munashganta rurangapä.”
43006071	Jesús sayno nergan Simonpa surin Judas Iscariotipämi. Chunca ishcay acrashgan cag discïpuluncunapita carpis paymi autoridäcunata pushargan Jesusta prësu sariyänanpä.
43007001	Saypitanami Galilea provinciacho cag marcacunapa Jesús purergan. Judea provinciaman manami aywayta munargansu Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna payta wanusiyta munayaptin.
43007002	Jerusalencho Ramäda estapä walca junagla pishiycaptinmi wauguincuna Jesusta niyargan: “Fiestapä Jerusalenman ayway. Saychöpis milagrucunata ruray discïpuluyquicuna ricayänanpä.
43007004	Reguish cayta munarga manami caylachösu milagrucunata ruranquiman. Jerusalén marcachöpis milagrucunata ruray lapanpis ricayänanpä.”
43007005	Jesuspa wauguincuna sayno niyargan Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta mana criyiyashpanmi.
43007006	Saymi wauguincunata Jesús nergan: “Nogaga manami aywashäräsu. Gamcunami isanga imay hörapis aywayanquiman.
43007007	Saychöga runacuna manami chasquicayämansu, jusalicushgancunata niptë. Gamcunatami isanga chasquicuyäshunqui, jusalicushganta mana niyaptiqui.
43007008	Gamcunala aywayay say estamanga. Manami hörä chämunräsu sayman aywanäpäga.”
43007009	Sayno nirmi Galilea provinciacho Jesús quëdacorgan.
43007010	Wauguincuna Ramäda estaman aywasquiyaptinrämi pitapis mana wilapaylapa Jesuspis aywargan.
43007011	Fiestacho Jesusta mana ricarmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna parlayargan: “¿Maychörä say runa caycan?” nir.
43007012	Waquin runacuna niyargan Jesús ali runa cashganta. Y waquinnami niyargan lutanta yachasir puriycashganta.
43007013	Isanga autoridäcunata mansapäyashpan manami pipis lutalaga Jesuspita parlacorgansu runacuna wiyayga.
43007014	Ramäda esta pulancho caycaptinnami Jerusalenman Jesús chargan. Nircurnami templo patiuman aywaycur Tayta Diosninsipa wilacuyninta yachasergan.
43007015	Saycho yachasishganta wiyaycur yachag cashganta tantyarmi autoridäcuna niyargan: “Mana estudiash caycarga ¿imanöpatä cay runa ali yachan?”
43007016	Sayno niyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Nogaga yachä cachamagnë Tayta Dios yachasimash captinmi. Manami quiquiläpitasu cayno yachä.
43007017	Yachasishgäcuna Tayta Dios munashganno cashganta musyayta munarga pay munashganno cawayay. Saynöparämi tantyayanquipä yachasishgäcuna Tayta Diospita cashganta.
43007018	“Waquin runacunaga, ali ricash cayta munar, quiquinpa yarpaylanpitami yachasir puriyan. Nogaga manami paycunanösu yachasë, sinöga cachamagnë Tayta Dios munashgannölami yachasë.
43007019	Gamcunaga Moisés guelgashgancunata sararaycanquimi saycunata yachacur Tayta Dios munashganno cawayänayquipä. Sayno sarararpis manami maygayquipis pay munashgannösu cawaycäyanqui. Saymi wanusimayta munaycäyanqui.”
43007020	Jesús sayno niptinmi runacuna niyargan: “¿Pitä gamta wanusiyta munaycäshunqui? ¡Supay imacher gamta löcutaycäsishunqui!”
43007021	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Sábado jamay junagcho puriyta mana puëdeg runata aliyäsishgaläpitami gamcunaga wanusimayta munaycäyanqui.
43007022	Tantyacuyay. Moisés yachasergan olgu wamra yurishganpita puwag (8) junagyog caycaptin cuerpunta señalasinansipämi. (Moisés yachasiptinpis say costumbrega cargan más unaypitanami.) Moisés guelgashgancunata cumplir ¿manacu sábado jamay junag captinpis olgu wamrapa cuerpunta señalayanqui?
43007023	Olgu wamrayquicunapa cuerpunta sábado jamay junag caycaptinpis señalaycarga ¿imanirtä nogata rabiapaycäyämanqui sábado jamay junagcho gueshyag runata aliyäsishgäpita?
43007024	Pï cashgätapis manarä shumag tantyarga ¿imanirtä jusayog cashgäta yarpäyanqui? Shumag juiciuyquiwan parlayay.”
43007025	Saymi Jerusalencho tag waquin runacuna quiquinpura parlar niyargan: “¿Manacu cay runataga ashiycäyan wanusiyänanpä?
43007026	Asca runacunapa naupancho yachasiptinpis ¿imanirtä autoridäcuna upälacuyan? ¿Autoridäcunapis Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashgantasurä yarpaycäyan?
43007027	Manami payga Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristusu canman. Musyansimi may marcapita pay cashgantapis. Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo shamuptenga manami pipis musyangapäsu maypita cashgantapis.”
43007028	Runacuna sayno parlaycäyashgantami templo patiucho yachasishgan höra Jesús wiyargan. Saymi nergan: “Gamcuna manami rasunpaypasu musyayanqui maypita shamushgätapis. Manami quiquëpa munayläpitasu cay pasaman shamushcä, sinöga Tayta Dios cachamaptinmi shamushcä.
43007029	Tayta Diospita shamush carmi noga musyä pay imano cashgantapis.”
43007030	Sayno niptinmi waquin runacuna rabiacuyashpan Jesusta prësu sarisiyta munayargan. Isanga prësu sariyargansu höran manarä captinmi.
43007031	Sayno captinpis ascagmi criyiyargan Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta. Saymi paycuna niyargan: “Milagrucunata rurashganta ricarmi criyinsi Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta.”
43007032	Runacuna Jesuspa favornin sayno nicäyashganta wiyaycurmi fariseo runacunawan mandag cüracuna cachayargan templo täpag wardiacunata Jesusta prësu sariyämunanpä.
43007033	Prësu saregcuna chäyänanpäga Jesús caynömi yachaycäsergan: “Gamcunawanga manami asca watasu caycäshäpä. Nogaga cachamagnë Taytä cagmanmi cuticushäpä.
43007034	Ashiyämashpayquipis manami tariyämanquipäsu. Noga aywashgä cagmanga manami aywayta camäpacuyanquipäsu.”
43007035	Jesús sayno niptinmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna quiquinpura parlar niyargan: “Mana tarinansipäga ¿mayparä aywaconga? ¿Juclä nacioncho tag marca mayinsicunamansurä aywanga Diosta mana criyegcunata yachasinanpä?
43007036	¿Imanirtä ashirpis mana tarinansipä cashganta nicämansi? ¿Imanirtä pay aywashgan cagman chayta mana camäpacunansipä cashganta nicämansi?”
43007037	Ramäda estacho día junagmi lapan runacuna wiyayänanpä Jesús nergan: “Segaypa yacunaypanörä Tayta Diospa maquincho cawayta munag cäga nogata chasquicayämäsun.
43007038	Tayta Diosninsipa palabrancho nishgannöpis pucyupita chuya yacuta upur cushicushgannömi chasquicamagcunapis yupa cushicuyangapä.”
43007039	Sayno nishpanmi Jesús tantyasergan runacunapa shonguncho Santu Espíritu cananpä cashganta. Say wisanga Santu Espíritu manami chämorganräsu. Gloriaman Jesús cuticuptinrämi payta chasquicogcunaman Santu Espíritu shamorgan.
43007040	Jesús sayno nishganta wiyaycurmi saycho cag waquin runacuna niyargan: “Moisés nishganno shamunanpä cag profëta imacher payga caycan.”
43007041	Waquin runacuna niyargan: “Paytami Tayta Dios cachamush salvamänansipä.” Y waquinnami niyargan: “Galilea runa caycarga ¿imanöpatä payga Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo canman?
43007042	Tayta Diosninsipa palabranchöga nican mandag rey David castapita Cristo yurinanpä cashgantami. Saynöpis nican Belenchörä yurinanpä cashgantami. Belencho mana yurish carga manami payga salvamagninsi Cristo canmansu.”
43007043	Sayno nirmi waquenga Jesuspa contran parlayargan y waquinnami favornin sharcuyargan.
43007044	Chasquicuyta mana munarmi waquincuna prësu sariyta munayargan. Sayno munarpis manami sariyargansu.
43007045	Saypitami templo täpag wardiacuna cuticuyargan mandag cüracunawan fariseo runacuna caycäyashgan cagman. Cutiycuyaptinmi tapuyargan: “¿Imanirtä Jesusta prësu apayämushcanquisu?” nir.
43007046	Sayno tapuyaptinmi wardiacuna niyargan: “¡Pay parlashgantanöga manami imaypis wiyayashcäsu!”
43007047	Sayno niyaptinmi fariseo runacuna niyargan: “¿Gamcunatapis criyisiyäshushcanquicu Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta?
43007048	Say runataga manami maygan autoridäcunapis ni fariseo runacunapis criyiyansu Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta.
43007049	Mana yachag runacunalami paytaga criyiyan. ¡Say runacunaga manami musyayansu maycho sengan cashgantapis!”
43007050	Sayno niyaptinmi Nicodemo nergan: “Leyninsicuna nishgannöpis puntata quiquin parlashgantarä wiyashun imano cashgantapis ninansipäga.” (Nicodemoga cargan fariseo runami. Paymi naupata Jesús cagman aywargan paywan parlananpä.)
43007052	Saymi paycuna niyargan: “¿Gampis paypa marca mayincu caycanqui favornin sharcunayquipä? ¡Tayta Diosninsipa palabranchöpis manami imaypis nimansisu Galileapita profëta cananpä cashganta!”
43007053	[Saypitanami wayincunapana lapan cuticuyargan.
43008001	Saypitanami Jesús aywargan Olivos lömaman.
43008002	Saypita waraynin tuta templo patiuman cutiptinmi runacuna pay cashgan cagman shuntacäyargan. Saychömi Jesús paycunata yachasergan.
43008003	Saymanmi Moisés guelgashgan leycunata yachasegcunawan fariseo runacuna apayargan jusalicog warmita. Say warmita tariyargan runanta ganrataycagta. Sayno tariycurmi saycho caycag runacunapa naupanman say warmita ichiycasir Jesusta tapuyargan:
43008004	“Cay warmita tariyashcä runanta ganratar juc runawan punuycagtami, taytay.
43008005	Moisés guelgashganchöga nimansi cayno warmicunataga samgaypa wanusinansipämi. Gamga ¿imaninquitä, taytay?”
43008006	Sayno tapuyargan Jesusta lutanta parlasiyta munayashpanmi. Sayno tapuyaptinmi Jesús dëdunwan guelgargan pampacho.
43008007	Yaparir yaparir tapuyaptinnami ichircur Jesús nergan: “Maygayquipis jusaynag carga mä say warmita samgayay.”
43008008	Sayno nircurmi pampacho yapay guelgargan.
43008009	Sayno nishganta wiyaycuyashpanmi auquincunapita galaycur lapanpis gatimaylaman yargur aywacuyargan. Lapan aywacuyaptinnami say warmilana Jesuspa naupancho quëdargan.
43008010	Saymi say warmita Jesús nergan: “¿Maytä samgashunayquipä apamushogniquicuna? ¿Manacu ni juclaylapis samgashushcanqui?”
43008011	Sayno niptin say warmi nergan: “Manami mayganpis samgayämashgasu, taytay.” Saymi Jesús nergan: “Nogapis manami munäsu samgash canayquita. Cananga wayiquipana aywacuy. Isanga amana jusalicuynasu.”]
43008012	Saypitanami runacunata Jesús nergan: “Cay pasacho runacunapäga acsinömi caycä. Saymi nogata chasquicamag cäga manami Satanaspa munayninchönasu canga, sinöga Tayta Diospa maquincho car acsichöno cushish cawangapä.”
43008013	Sayno niptinmi fariseo runacuna niyargan: “Sayno cashgayquita quiquilayqui nicaptiquega ¿imanöpatä nogacuna criyiyäman?”
43008014	Sayno niyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Quiquilä niptëpis noga nishgäcunaga rasun cagmi caycan. Taytäpa naupanpita shamushgäta y sayman cuticunäpä cashgantapis musyämi. Gamcunaga manami musyayanquisu maypita shamushgäta y mayman cuticunäpä cashgantapis.
43008015	Saymi yarpaylayquicunapita juzgaycäyämanqui. Nogaga manami gamcunanösu pitapis juzgä.
43008016	Cachamagnë Taytä nogawan imaypis captinmi pitapis juzgarga rasun caglata juzgä.
43008017	“Moisés guelgashganchöpis caynömi nican: ‘Ishcay testïgucuna say yarpayla niyaptinrämi criyiyanqui imapis rasun cag cashganta.’
43008018	Say nishgannölami ishcay testïgucuna caycäyan Tayta Dios cachamashgan Cristo cashgäta ninanpä. Cachamagnë Taytämi juc testïgo, y jucag testïgöga quiquëmi caycä.”
43008019	Sayno niptinmi tapuyargan: “Nishgayqui rasunpaypa cashganta tapuyänäpä ¿maychötä taytayqui caycan?” Saymi Jesús nergan: “Gamcunaga manami musyayanquisu Taytä pï cashgantapis ni noga pï cashgätapis. Noga pï cashgäta musyarga Taytä pï cashgantapis musyayanquimanmi.”
43008020	Templucho Jesús sayno nergan ofrendata shuntacuna churarashgan cagchömi. Runacunapa naupancho yachasiptinpis manami pipis payta prësu sariyargansu, höran manarä captinmi.
43008021	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Jusalicushgayquipita mana perdonash carmi gamcunaga aywanäpä cashgan cagman imaypis chanquipäsu. Saymi aywacuptë ashimarpis tariyämanquipäsu.”
43008022	Sayno niptinmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna niyargan: “¿Imanirtä aywacunanpä cashganta nicämansi? ¿Wanusicuytasurä payga yarpaycan? Saycher pay cashgan cagman mana chänansipä cashgantaga nicämansi.”
43008023	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Nogaga gloriapitami shamushcä. Gamcunaga cay pasacho yureglami caycäyanqui.
43008024	Saymi pï cashgäta wilaptëpis criyiyämanquisu. Sayno mana criyiyämashgayquipitami gloriaman imaypis chäyanquipäsu.”
43008025	Sayno niptin niyargan: “Sayno parlanayquipäga ¿pitä gam canqui?” Saymi Jesús nergan: “Pï cashgätapis maynami wilashcä.
43008026	Gamcunata tantyasinäpä ascarämi caycan. Sayno captinpis noga yachasishgäcuna manami quiquëpa yarpayläpitasu caycan, sinöga cachamagnë Taytä tantyasimashgalanmi. Pay nimashgancunaga lapanpis rasun cagmi caycan.”
43008027	Jesús sayno parlapaycaptinpis paycunaga manami tantyayargansu Tayta Diosninsi paypa taytan cashganta.
43008028	Sayno mana tantyayaptinmi Jesús nergan: “NOGA pï cashgäta canan mana tantyarpis wanusimashgayqui hörami tantyayanquipä pï cashgäta y Taytä nimashgannöla wilacushgätapis.
43008029	Cachamagnë Taytäga imaypis nogawanmi caycan. Pay munashgannöla ruraptëmi imaypis yanapaycäman.”
43008030	Jesús sayno niptinmi ascag criyiyargan Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta.
43008031	Saypitanami payman criyeg Israel runacunapa autoridänincunata Jesús nergan: “Yachasishgänöla imaypis cawarga rasunpaypami discïpulöcuna cayanquipä.
43008032	Sayno cawarmi tantyayanquipä yachasishgäcuna rasun cag cashganta. Sayno tantyacorga manami diablupa munayninchönasu cawayanquipä.”
43008033	Sayno niptinmi niyargan: “Abrahampa castan caycäyaptëga ¿imanirtä sayno niyämanqui? Nogacunaga manami imaypis diablupa munayninchösu cawayashcä, sinöga Tayta Diospa maquilanchömi.”
43008034	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Shumag tantyacuyay. Jusalicuycho cawarga manami Tayta Diospa maquinchösu cawaycäyanqui. Jusalicog cäga lapanpis diablupa munayninchömi caycäyan.
43008035	Diablupa munaynincho cawarga manami Diospa wamransu caycan, sinöga diablupami. Nogaga Diospa surin carmi munayyog caycä diablupa munaynincho caycagcunata jorgunäpä.
43008036	Diablupa munaynincho cayashgayquipita noga jorguptëmi Tayta Diospa wamran rasunpaypa cayanquipä.
43008037	“Musyämi Abrahampa castan gamcuna cayashgayquita. Abrahampa castan caycarpis manami nishgäcunata chasquicayämanquisu. Chasquicamänayquipa trucanga ¿imanirtä wanusimayta munaycäyämanqui?
43008038	Taytäpa naupancho caycar musyashgäcunatami gamcunata wilapaycä. Sayno wilapaptëpis gamcunaga taytayqui munashgalantami ruraycäyanqui.”
43008039	Saymi paycuna niyargan: “¡Abrahampa castan cayaptë paymi nogacunapa taytä!” Sayno niyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Abrahampa castan caycarpis manami pay cawashgannösu cawaycäyanqui.
43008040	Abrahamga manami imaypis yarpargansu Tayta Diospa wilacogninta wanusiyta. Gamcunaga wanusimayta munaycäyanqui Tayta Dios nimashgancunata wilacuptëmi.
43008041	Mana chasquicamaptiquimi musyacaycan gamcunapa taytayqui diablo cashganta. Saymi pay rurashgannöla imaypis ruraycäyanqui.” Sayno niptin paycuna niyargan: “Nogacunapa Taytäga Tayta Diosmi. Manami diablupa surinsu cayä.”
43008042	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Tayta Dios rasunpaypa taytayqui captenga nogata cuyayämanquimanmi. Paymi gloriapita cachamash cay pasaman shamunäpä. Manami quiquëpa munayläpitasu noga shamushcä.
43008043	¿Imanirtä gamcuna tantyayämanquisu nishgäcunata? Chasquicamayta mana munarmi yaparir yaparir niptëpis gamcunaga tantyacuyanquisu.
43008044	“Gamcunapa taytayquega diablumi caycan. Saymi pay munashgalanta imatapis ruraycäyanqui. Unaypita-pasa runa wanuseg pay cashgannömi gamcunapis nogata wanusimayta munaycäyämanqui. Saynöpis lula carmi diabloga imaypis rasun cagtaga parlansu.
43008045	Nogaga rasun caglatami Tayta Diosninsipa wilacuyninta gamcunata yachasë. Tayta Diosninsipa wilacuyninta chasquicuyta mana munarmi nogatapis chasquicayämanquisu.
43008046	“Imaypis mana jusalicush captëmi imatapis niyämänayquipä tariyanquisu. Rasun cagta wilacuycaptëga ¿imanirtä chasquicayämanquisu?
43008047	Tayta Dios taytayqui captenga wilacuyninta cäsucuyanquimanmi. Wilacuyninta mana cäsucuyaptiquimi musyä Diospa wamran mana cayashgayquita.”
43008048	Sayno niptinmi say autoridäcuna niyargan: “¡Gamga Samaria runacunanömi lutanta parlaycanqui! ¡Gamtaga supay imacher löcutaycäsishunqui!”
43008049	Sayno niyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Nogaga manami löcusu caycä, sinöga Taytä munashgalantami parlaycä. Sayno parlaptëpis gamcunaga mana tantyashpayquimi chiquiycäyämanqui.
43008050	Runacuna chasquicayämaptinpis o mana chasquicayämaptinpis nogaga Taytä munashgannölami wilacuycä. Mana chasquicamag cagtaga Taytämi juzganga.
43008051	Nishgäcunata chasquicogcunami isanga gloriaman char imaypis wanuyangapäsu.”
43008052	Saymi autoridäcuna niyargan: “Cananmi isanga rasunpaypa musyayä supay löcutaycäsishushgayquita. Abraham y Tayta Diosninsipa profëtancunapis lapanmi wanuyash. Sayno caycaptinpis gamga nicanqui: ‘Nishgäcunata chasquicogcunaga manami wanuyangapäsu.’
43008053	Sayno nerga ¿mana wanunayquipä cashgantacu yarpaycanqui? Mana wanunayquipäga manami Abrahampita más munayyogsu caycanqui. Paypis y Tayta Diosninsipa profëtancunapis wanush caycäyaptenga ¿pï cashgayquitatä gamga yarpanqui?”
43008054	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Sayno nishgäpita ama yarpäyaysu alabacuycashgäta. Taytä cachamash captinmi rasun caglata nicä. Gamcunaga Taytäta ‘Diosnëmi’ nicarga ¿imanirtä criyiyämanquisu nishgäcunata?
43008055	Taytä imano cashgantapis gamcuna manami musyayanquisu. Nogami isanga lapanta musyä imano cashgantapis. Saymi Taytä nimashgancunalata parlaycä. Gamcuna munayashgayquino yachaserga manami rasun cagtasu parläman, sinöga gamcunanölami lulacuycäman.
43008056	‘Abrahampa castanmi nogacuna caycäyä’ niyaptiquipis Abrahamga manami gamcunanösu cargan. Payga cushicorganmi cay pasaman shamunäpä cashganta musyashpan.”
43008057	Saymi autoridäcuna Jesusta niyargan: “Manarä ni pisga chunca (50) watayoglapis caycarga ¿imanöpatä Abrahamta reguinquiman cargan?”
43008058	Sayno niyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Tantyacuyay. Abraham manarä yuriptin nogaga maynami caycargäna.”
43008059	Jesús sayno niptinmi rumita aptacuyargan samgaypa wanusiyänanpä. Sayno samgayta munayaptinmi runacunapa chaupinpa päsarir templo patiupita Jesús aywacorgan.
43009001	Jerusalencho puriycarmi Jesuspa discïpuluncuna ricayargan yurishganpita-pasa gapra runata.
43009002	Saymi Jesusta tapuyargan: “Taytay, ¿imanirtä cay runa gapra yurish? ¿Mamanpawan taytanpa jusanpitacu o quiquinpa jusanpitacu?”
43009003	Sayno tapuyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Manami quiquinpa ni mamanpa ni taytanpa jusanpitasu cay runa gapra yurish, sinöga aliyäsiptë Tayta Dios munayyog cashganta runacuna tantyacuyänanpämi.
43009004	Saymi cay pasacho cashgäyag cachamagnë Tayta Dios munashganno runacunata aliyaycäsë.
43009005	Cay pasacho cashgäyäga runacunapä acsinömi caycä.”
43009006	Sayno nishpanmi pampaman Jesús togaycur mituta rurargan. Nircurna say mituwan gaprapa nawinta püchapargan.
43009007	Püchaparcurmi nergan: “Siloé nishgan pözuman ayway saycho maylacamunayquipä.” (Siloé ninanga “Cachamush” ninanmi.) Jesús nishganno maylacaramurnami ricaycarna cutergan.
43009008	Saymi vecïnuncuna y payta reguegcuna niyargan: “¿Manacu cay runaga caridäta manacog gapra runa caycan?”
43009009	Waquin niyargan: “Au, paymi.” Waquinnami niyargan: “Manami paysu. Isanga pay-niragmi.” Sayno niyaptinmi quiquin nergan: “Au, nogami yurishgäpita-pasa gapra cargä.”
43009010	Saymi payta tapuyargan: “¿Imanöpatä aliyaycushcanqui?” nir.
43009011	Sayno tapuyaptinmi nergan: “Jesusmi togayninwan mituta rurarcur nawëta püchapämash. Nircurnami cachamash Siloé nishgan pözuman nawëta maylacunäpä. Saycho maylacushgäpitami cananga nawë ricaycanna.”
43009012	Saymi payta yapay tapuyargan: “¿Maychötä caycan say aliyäsishogniqui runaga?” Sayno tapuyaptin nergan: “Manami musyäsu maycho caycashgantapis.”
43009013	Saypitana say gapra cashganpita aliyash runata pushayargan fariseo runacunaman.
43009014	Sábado jamay junag aliyash captinmi fariseo runacuna payta tapuyargan imanöpa aliyashgantapis. Tapuyaptinmi nergan: “Juc runami nawëta mituwan püchapämargan. Say püchapämashgan mituta maylacusquiptëmi nawë ricaycanna, taytay.”
43009016	Saymi waquin fariseo runacuna niyargan: “Say aliyäsishogniqui runaga manami Tayta Dios cachamushgansu canman. Tayta Dios cachamushgan runa carga sábado jamay junagchöga manami aliyäsinmansu pitapis.” Saycho caycag waquin runacunanami niyargan: “Tayta Dios mana cachamush captenga ¿imanöpatä aliyäsinman cargan say runata?”
43009017	Saymi yapay tapuyargan gapra cashganpita aliyash runata: “Gamga ¿pï cashgantatä yarpanqui say aliyäsishogniqui runapäga?” Sayno tapuyaptinmi nergan: “Nogaga yarpä Tayta Diosninsipa profëtan cashgantami.”
43009018	Sayno niptinpis Israel runacunapa autoridänincunaga manami criyiyargansu rasunpaypa gapra cashganta. Saymi mamantawan taytanta gayaycasimur tapuyargan:
43009019	“¿Cay runa suriquicu? ¿Rasunpacu gapra yurergan? ¿Imanöpatä aliyash?” nir.
43009020	Saymi mamanwan taytan niyargan: “Au, payga surëmi. Rasunpaypami yurishganpita-pasa gapra cash.
43009021	Isanga manami musyayäsu imanöpa aliyashgantapis ni pï aliyäsishgantapis. Payga caycan juiciuyog runanami. Quiquinta tapuyay.”
43009022	Mamanwan taytan sayno niyargan autoridäcunata mansacuyashpanmi. Autoridäcunaga wilanacuyashganami caycäyargan mayganpis: “Jesusga Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristumi” neg cagtaga sinagogapita garguyänanpä.
43009023	Sayta mansacurmi mamanwan taytan niyargan: “Payga juiciuyog runanami. Quiquinta tapuyay.”
43009024	Saymi gapra cashganpita aliyash runata autoridäcuna yapay gayasiyämorgan tapuyänanpä: “Tayta Dios ricaycäshunquimi. Rasun cagta wilayämay. Musyayämi say aliyäsishogniqui runataga Tayta Dios mana cachamushganta.”
43009025	Saymi say runa nergan: “Nogaga manami musyäsu Tayta Dios cachamushganta o mana cachamushgantapis. Isanga musyä gapra cashgäpita aliyäsimashgantami.”
43009026	Sayno niptin yapay tapuyargan: “¿Imatatä rurash aliyäsishunayquipä?”
43009027	Niptinmi nergan: “Maynami gamcunata wilashcäna. Wilaptëpis manami criyiyämanquisu. ¿Imanirtä yaparir yaparir tapuyämanqui? ¿Gamcunapis payta gatiraytacu munaycäyanqui?”
43009028	Sayno niptinmi rabiacuyashpan niyargan: “Gamcher paypa discïpulonga caycanquega. Nogacunaga Moisés yachasishgancunatami cäsucuyä.
43009029	Musyayämi Moisesta Tayta Dios mandamientuncunata entregashganta. Say aliyäsishogniqui runataga, jusasapa captin, Tayta Dios manami imatapis musyasishgasu.”
43009030	Sayno niyaptinmi gapra cashganpita aliyash runa nergan: “¿Imanötä sayga? Say runa nawëta aliyaycäsimaptenga ¿imanirtä tantyayanquisu Tayta Dios cachamushganta?
43009031	Milagruta rurananpäga Tayta Dios manami imaypis jusasapacunata yanapansu, sinöga payta adorar munashganno cawagcunalatami.
43009032	Manami imaypis wiyashcansisu yurishganpita-pasa gapra runata pipis aliyäsishganta.
43009033	Tayta Dios mana yanapaptenga say runa manami imanöpapis aliyäsimanmansu cargan.”
43009034	Sayno niptinmi autoridäcuna niyargan: “¡Gamga jusasapa carmi gaprapis yurishcanqui! ¡Sayno caycarga manami imatapis nogacunata yachasiyämanquimansu!” Sayno niyashpanmi sinagogapita say runata garguyargan imaypis manana cutinanpä.
43009035	Say aliyäsishgan runata sinagogapita garguyashgantami Jesús musyargan. Saymi paywan tincurcur nergan: “¿Tayta Dios cachamushgan runaman yäracunquicu?”
43009036	Niptin say runa nergan: “Reguerga payman yäracömanmi, taytay.”
43009037	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Tayta Dios cachamushgan runawanga maynami tincushcanqui. Say runaga nogami caycä.”
43009038	Sayno niptinmi Jesuspa puntanman gongurpacuycur nergan: “Gamman yäracömi, taytay.”
43009039	Sayno niptinmi Jesús nergan: “Nogaga cay pasaman shamushcä mana tantyacogcunata tantyasinäpä y yachag-tucogcunata upatacäsinäpämi.”
43009040	Sayno nishganta wiyayashpanmi saycho caycag waquin fariseo runacuna niyargan: “¿Nogacunapis upa cayashgätacu yarpanqui?”
43009041	Sayno niyaptin Jesús nergan: “Gapra runa chasquicamashganno gamcunapis chasquicayämaptiquega Tayta Dios jusayquicunata perdonayäshunquimanmi. ‘Salvashganami caycä’ nicarpis nogata mana chasquicamaptiquega Tayta Dios manami perdonayäshunquipäsu.”
43010001	Mastapis Jesús nergan: “Uysha cunchaman puncupa mana yaycog cäga suwami caycan.
43010002	Cuncha puncupa yaycog cagmi isanga uyshapa ämun caycan.
43010003	Musyashgansinöpis cuncha puncuta quichapasquiptin uyshapa ämonga jutinpa jutinpa gayan uyshancunata. Sayno gayashganta wiyashpanmi cunchapita uyshancuna yargayämun.
43010004	Lapan yargamurnami ämunpa guepanta aywayan, ämunta reguiyashpan.
43010005	Jäpa captenga manami gatiräyansu. Gatiräyänanpa trucanga gueshpirmi aywacuyan.”
43010006	Tincusiypa sayno Jesús yachasiptinmi saycho cag runacuna tantyayargansu sayno tincusir imata yachaycäsishgantapis.
43010007	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Nogaga caycä uysha cuncha puncunömi.
43010008	Saymi cuncha puncupa uyshacuna yaycuyashganno nogata chasquicamag runacuna gloriaman yaycuyangapä. Uyshacuna ali guewacho weray weray cayashgannömi nogata chasquicamagcuna ali cawayta tariyangapä. Manarä shamuptë waquin runacuna lutanta yachasiyashpan puriyargan: ‘Nogatami Tayta Dios cachamash wilacuyninta wilacunäpä’ niyashpan. Sayno yachasiyaptinpis Tayta Diosman rasunpaypa yäracogcuna paycunata manami chasquicuyargansu.
43010010	Suwaga shamun suwacunanpä, wanusinanpä y ushacäsinanpämi. Nogami isanga shamushcä chasquicamag runacuna imayyagpis cushishla cawayänanpä.
43010011	“Saynöpis uyshanta ali miseg runanömi caycä. Uyshancunata wanuy caway misegnin salvashgannömi nogapis uyshäcunata salvanä-raycu wanushäpä.
43010012	Pägu-raycula misipacog cäga löbu shamuptin gueshpirmi aywacun. Sayno aywacun ämun mana cashpanmi. Sauraga löbu gaticachaptin uyshacuna gueshpir mashipa mashirmi may-saypapis aywacuyan.
43010013	Sayno misipacog cäga uyshacuna elagaptinpis manami imapis gocunsu.
43010014	“Nogaga rasunpaypa ali miseg runanömi caycä. Saymi Taytäta reguishgäno y pay nogata reguimashganno nogapis uyshäcunata reguë y uyshäcunapis nogata reguiyäman. Saynöpis uyshäcuna-raycumi wanushäpä.
43010016	Manami caylachösu uyshäcuna caycan, sinöga may-saychöpis caycanmi. Paycunapis nishgäcunata wiyar cäsucayämangami. Saymi paycunatapis shuntamushä juc cunchalachöna cananpä. Saynöpis juclaylanami uysha misegnin cangapä.
43010017	“Taytäta cäsucur uyshäcuna-raycumi wanushä. Nircurnami cawarimushäpä. Sayno cäsucog captëmi Taytä cushicun.
43010018	Noga munayyogmi caycä wanunäpä y cawarimunäpäpis. Saymi quiquë mana munaptëga pipis wanusimanmansu. Sayno captinpis Taytä nimashgannömi wanushä y wanushgäpita cawarimushä.”
43010019	Jesús sayno parlaptinmi Israel runacunapa waquin autoridänincuna yarpäyargan rasun cagta nicashganta y waquin cagna yarpäyargan quiquinpa yarpaylanpita parlaycashganta.
43010020	Saymi waquin niyargan: “Payta supay löcutaycäsiptenga ¿imapätä cäsushunpis?”
43010021	Y waquin cagnami niyargan: “Supay löcutäsish captenga manami sayno parlanmansu. Saynöpis gapra runata manami aliyäsinmansu cargan.”
43010022	Diciembri quila templupa aniversariun estata rurayaptinmi templucho Jesús puriycargan Salomón nishgan alarcho.
43010024	Saychömi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna Jesusta tapuyargan: “¿Imayyagtä shuyäshayqui rasun cagta wilayämänayquipä? Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashgayquita o mana cashgayquitapis jucla wilayämay.”
43010025	Sayno niyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Maynami gamcunata wilashcä. Wilaptëpis manami criyiyämanquisu. Taytäpa munayninwan milagrucunata ruraycaptëpis manami criyiyämanquisu.
43010026	Gamcunaga criyiyämanquisu uyshäcuna mana cayashpayquimi.
43010027	“Uyshäcunami isanga pï cashgätapis tantyayashpan cäsucayäman. Saynöpis reguëmi uyshäcuna maygan maygan cashganta.
43010028	Nogata chasquicamashganpitami Tayta Diospa naupancho imayyagpis cawayangapä. Maquëcho captinnaga manami pipis guechumanganasu.
43010029	Maquëcho caycarga Taytäpa maquinchöpis caycanmi. Taytä lapanpäpis munayyog captinmi diablupis ni supaypis ni pipis paypa maquinpita jorgongasu.
43010030	Taytäwan nogaga juclaylami caycä.”
43010031	Sayno niptinmi say autoridäcuna Jesusta samgayta munayargan.
43010032	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Gamcuna ricayashcanquimi asca milagrucunata Taytäpa munayninwan rurashgäta. ¿Sayno alita rurashgäpitacu samgayta munaycäyämanqui?”
43010033	Saymi say runacuna niyargan: “Manami alita rurashgayquipitasu samgayta munayä, sinöga runala caycar Dios-tucuycashgayquipitami.”
43010034	Sayno niyaptin Jesús nergan: “Tayta Diosninsipa palabrancho caynömi nican: ‘Gamcunaga dioscunami caycäyanqui.’
43010035	Musyayanquimi Tayta Diospa palabrancho lapanpis rasun cagla cashganta. Saymi Diospa wilacuyninta unay wiyagcunapä: ‘Gamcunaga dioscunami caycäyanqui’ nicaptenga ¿imanirtä: ‘Diospa surinmi caycä’ niptë yarpäyanqui lutanta nicashgäta? Quiquin Tayta Diosninsimi cay pasaman cachamash.
43010037	“Milagruta rurashgäcuna Taytä munashganno mana captenga ama criyiyämaysu: ‘Diospa surinmi caycä’ niptëpis.
43010038	Nishgäcunata mana criyirpis milagruta rurashgäcunata ricaycarga tantyacuyay Taytäwan say yarpayla cayashgäta.”
43010039	Sayno nishganpitami Jesusta yapay prësu sarisiyta munayargan. Sayno munayaptinpis Jesús saypita aywacorgan.
43010040	Nircurnami Jordán mayu simpanman Jesús cutergan. Saychömi naupata Juan Bautista bautizargan runacunata.
43010041	Jesús saycho cashganta musyarmi sayman asca runacuna aywayargan. Paycunami niyargan: “Ima milagrutapis Juan Bautista mana ruraptinpis Jesuspä lapan nishgancunaga rasun caglami caycan.”
43010042	Sayno nirmi asca runacuna criyiyargan Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta.
43011001	Betania marcachömi targan juc runa Lázaro jutiyog. Paymi pasaypa ansa caycargan. Paypa panincunami cayargan Mariawan Marta.
43011002	(Mariami Jesuspa chaquinman perfümita winaparcur agsanwan pisapargan.)
43011003	Lázaro ansa caycaptinmi panincuna juc runata Jesusman cachacorgan: “Cuyanacuyashgayqui Läzarumi wanuycanna, taytay” nir wilananpä.
43011004	Sayno wilaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Läzaruta say gueshya sarish manami wanushgalancho quëdananpäsu, sinöga noga cawarisimuptë munayyog cashgäta runacuna tantyacuyänanpämi.”
43011005	Läzaruwan y panincunawan cuyanacurpis Jesús manami juclaga aywargansu. Saypa trucanga wanunaycashganta wilaycaptinpis cashgan caglachömi ishcay junag goyäcorgan. Saypitanami discïpuluncunata nergan: “Acu cutishun Judea provinciapa.”
43011008	Saymi discïpuluncuna niyargan: “Ganyancunarächä saycho cag runacuna samgaypa wanusiyta munayäshushcanqui, taytay. ¿Sayno caycaptincu sayman yapay cutiyta munaycanqui?”
43011009	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Ama mansacuyaysu. Wanusimänanpäga manami hörä chämunräsu. Musyashgansinöpis sacaypa puregcunalami mansacuyan. Junagpa puregcunaga manami mansacuyansu. Saynölami wanusiyämänanpä hörä manarä chämuptin gamcunaga mansacuyänayquisu.”
43011011	Nircurnami Jesús discïpuluncunata nergan: “Cuyashgansi Läzaroga punucashlami caycan. Acu aywashun ricchasinansipä.”
43011012	Sayno niptinmi discïpuluncuna niyargan: “Ali punuyta tariptinmi musyansi aliyänanpä cashganta, taytay.”
43011013	Lázaro punucash cashganta nirpis wanush cashgantami Jesús tumasipaylapa nergan. Saymi discïpuluncunaga mana tantyar punucash caycashgalanta yarpäyargan.
43011014	Sayno yarpäyaptinmi Jesús discïpuluncunata nergan: “Läzaroga wanushmi caycan.
43011015	Wanushganpita cawarisimuptëmi gamcuna más tantyayanquipä Tayta Dios cachamashganta. Saymi cushicö Lázaro cashgan cagcho mana cashgäpita. Pay cagman acu aywashun.”
43011016	Saymi Milish niyashgan Tomás discípulu mayincunata nergan: “Sayno captenga nogansipis wanunansipä aywashun.”
43011017	Betaniaman charnami Jesús musyargan chuscu junagna Lázaro pamparaycashganta.
43011018	Jerusalenpita Betaniaman media lëwanöla captinmi asca runacuna aywayargan Martatawan Mariata walquiyänanpä.
43011020	“Jesusmi shamuycan” negta wiyarmi Marta aywargan taripänanpä. Mariami isanga wayicho quëdacorgan.
43011021	Jesuswan tincurmi Marta nergan: “Caycho captiquega turë manachi wanuycunmansu cargan, taytay.
43011022	Imano captinpis gammanmi imaypis yäracö. Noga musyämi imata manacuptiquipis Tayta Dios wiyashushgayquita.”
43011023	Sayno niptinmi Jesús nergan: “Turiqui cawarimongami.”
43011024	Saymi Marta nergan: “Au, musyämi juicio nalcho wanushcuna cawarimuptin turëpis cawarimunanpä cashganta, taytay.”
43011025	Niptinmi Jesús nergan: “Nogami cawarisimö wanushcunata. Nogata chasquicamag cagtaga wanuptinpis cawarisimushämi gloriacho imayyagpis cawananpä. ¿Sayta criyinquicu?”
43011027	Sayno niptinmi Marta nergan: “Au, taytay. Noga criyëmi. Gammi Tayta Diospa surin caycanqui. Saynöpis caycanqui Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristumi.”
43011028	Sayno nircurmi Marta cutergan nanan María cagman paypis Jesuswan tincog aywananpä. Chaycushpanna gayaycur wilargan: “Jesusmi chämush. Paymi gayaycäshunqui” nir.
43011029	Sayno niptin María jucla aywargan.
43011030	Jesús manarämi marcaman charganräsu, sinöga Martawan tincushgalanchörämi caycargan.
43011031	Wayipita María jucla yargogta ricayashpanmi payta walqueg runacuna guepanta aywayargan: “Turin pamparaycashganmancher aywaycan wagananpä” niyashpan.
43011032	Jesús cagman María chaycurmi puntanman gongurpacuycur nergan: “Gam caycho captiquega manami turë wanunmansu cargan, taytay.”
43011033	Mariata y walquegnin runacunatapis wagaycagta ricarmi Jesuspis yupa laquicorgan.
43011034	Saymi paycunata taporgan: “¿Mayninchötä pamparaycan?” nir. Tapuptinmi niyargan: “Maynincho pamparaycashgantapis ricanayquipä aywashun, taytay.”
43011035	Pamparashgan cagman aywaycarmi Jesuspis laquicushpan Läzarupä wagargan.
43011036	Saymi waquin runacuna niyargan: “Ricay, segaypacher cuyanacuyargan Läzaruwan.”
43011037	Waquinnami niyargan: “Gapra runatapis aliyaycäserga ¿manasurä Läzarutapis aliyäsinman cargan mana wanunanpä?”
43011038	Fiyupa laquishmi Jesús chargan Lázaro pamparashgan cagman. Say pamparashgan sepultüraga cargan gagacho uchcushmi. Puncunnami saparargan jatun rumiwan.
43011039	Sayman chaycurmi Jesús nergan: “Saparaycag rumita witisiyay.” Sayno niptinmi Läzarupa panin Marta nergan: “Chuscu junagnami pamparaycan, taytay. Cananyäga segaypanacher asyaycan.”
43011040	Sayno niptin Jesús nergan: “¿Manacu nishcä nogaman yäracamaptiquega turiquita cawarisimunäpä cashganta?”
43011041	Sauraga saparaycag rumita witircasiyaptinnami ciëluta ricärir Jesús nergan: “Manacushgäta imaypis wiyamashgayquipitami gamta agradëcicamö, papá. Yanapämashgayquita ricarmi caycho caycag runacuna tantyayangapä gam cachamashgayquita.”
43011043	Nircurnami Jesús fuertipa nergan: “¡Lázaro, yargamuy!”
43011044	Sayno niptinmi wanush jitaraycashganpita cawarircamur Lázaro yargamorgan uman wancush y maquin chaquin wancush. Yargaramuptinnami Jesús nergan: “Purinanpä pascayay.”
43011045	Läzaruta cawarisimushganta ricaycurmi Mariata walqueg runacuna ascag criyiyargan Jesusta Tayta Dios cachamushganta.
43011046	Waquin cagnami fariseo runacunaman aywaycur wilayargan Läzaruta cawarisimuptin asca runacuna payman criyiycäyashganta.
43011047	Sayta wiyaycurmi mandag cüracunawan fariseo runacuna Israel runacunapa autoridänincunata gayaycasir niyargan: “Milagrucunata ruraptin aläpanami runacuna criyiycäyan Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta. ¿Imatatä rurashun say runata?
43011048	Payta prësu mana sarisishgaga milagro rurashgancunata ricar lapan runacunami munayanga nacionninsipa mandagnin rey cananta. Sayta wiyaycurmi Romacho mandag emperador yupa rabiacushpan soldäduncunata cachamonga templunsita juchusiyänanpä y lapansitapis wanusimänansipä.”
43011049	Sayno niyaptin más mandag cüra Caifás nergan: “¡Gamcunaga manami imatapis tantyayanquisu!
43011050	Templunsita mana juchusinanpä y mana ushacäsimänansipä say runala wanusun. Saynöpami lapansipis salvacushunpä.”
43011051	“Say runala wanusun lapansi salvacunansipä” nir Caifás nergan Roma runacuna Israel runacunata ushacäsiyänanta mana munarmi. Payga manami tantyargansu jusansicunapita wanur Jesús salvamänansipä cashganta. Mana tantyaptinpis sayno parlananpä Tayta Dios yarpayninman churargan más mandag cüra say wata captinmi. Caifás nishgannölami Jesús wanorgan Israel runacunata y mana Israel runacunatapis salvananpä.
43011053	Say junagpitanami autoridäcuna wilanacuyargan Jesusta wanusiyänanpä.
43011054	Sayta musyarmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna ricayga Jesús purergannasu. Saymi Judea provinciapita Jesús discïpuluncunawan aywacuyargan Efraín nishgan marcaman saycho goyäyänanpä. Say marcaga sunyag jirca cercalanchömi caycan.
43011055	Say junagcuna Pascua galaycunanpäna caycaptinmi marcancunapita asca runacuna Jerusalenman aywayargan Tayta Dios nishganno say estapä puestucog.
43011056	Templo patiuchönami runacuna niyargan: “Gamcunaga ¿imatatä yarpäyanqui? ¿Fiestapä Jesús shamongasurä o manasurä?” niyashpan.
43011057	Fariseo runacunawan mandag cüracuna maynami runacunata nish cashga: “Jesusta maychöpis ricashpayquega jucla wilayämanqui prësu sarisiyänäpä.”
43012001	Pascuapä sogta junag pishiycaptinmi Jesús aywargan Betania marcaman. Saychömi wanushganpita cawarisimushgan Lázaro targan.
43012002	Sayman Jesús chashganpita cushicurmi Läzarupa panincuna merendata yanucuyargan paywan micuyänanpä. Waquin runacunawan mësa cagman Jesús jamacuptinmi Läzarupis jamargan paycunawan micunanpä. Saymanmi panin Marta paycunata garargan.
43012003	Saycho micuycäyaptinmi botëllawan María apamorgan nardu jachapita rurash chanin cuestag perfümita. Nircurmi Jesuspa chaquinman winaparcur agsanwan saquisipargan. Say perfümimi wayi junta mushcorgan.
43012004	Saymi Jesusta entregananpä cag discïpulun Judas Iscariote nergan:
43012005	“¿Imanirtä cay perfümita perdiycäsin? Saypa trucanga ranticushwan cargan juc wata arupacur gänashgansichöno. Nircur say guellaywanna muchogcunata yanapashwan cargan.”
43012006	Judasmi shuntayashgan guellay sararag cargan. Sayno nergan manami muchogcunata yanapayta munarsu, sinöga quiquinpä guellayta raquinan cashmi.
43012007	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Winapämashganpita ama jamuraysu. Say perfümitaga churaräsish manarä wanuptë winapämänanpämi.
43012008	Muchogcunaga yanapäyänayquipä imaypis caycäyangami. Nogami isanga gamcunawan cashäpänasu.”
43012009	Betania marcacho Jesús caycashganta musyarmi asca runacuna sayman aywayargan. Manami Jesusta ricaglasu aywayargan, sinöga Lázaro cawarimushganta ricayänanpäwanmi aywayargan.
43012010	Läzaruta cawarisimushganpita Jesusman asca runacuna criyiptinmi mandag cüracuna Läzarutapis wanusiyta munayargan.
43012012	Waraynin tuta runacuna musyayargan Jerusalenman Jesús aywaycashganta. Saymi Pascuaman aywag asca runacuna, palmacunata muturcur, apayargan Jesusta chasquicuyänanpä. Jesús chaptinna niyargan: “¡Tayta Diosninsi cachamushgan mandamagninsi caychönami caycan! ¡Paymi mandamagninsi rey caycan!”
43012014	Tayta Diosninsipa palabrancho guelgaraycashgannölami manarä amansashga orgu ashnun muntash Jerusalenman Jesús chargan. Say guelgaraycashganga caynömi nican:
43012015	“Jerusalén marcacho tag runacuna, ricayay humildi runanöla mandagniqui rey manarä amansashga ashnun muntash shamuycagta.”
43012016	Jerusalenman ashnun muntash Jesús chaptinmi discïpuluncuna tantyayargansu imanir sayno ruraycashgantapis. Wanushganpita cawarircamuptinrämi tantyayargan Jesús rurashgancuna Tayta Diospa palabrancho nishgannöla caycashganta.
43012017	Läzaruta cawarisimushganta musyashpanmi asca runacuna cushish Jesusta taripag shayämorgan. Pay cawarisimushganta ricag runacunapis Tayta Diosta alabaraycar aywaycäyargan. Nänipa aywayashpanmi pï-maytapis tincushgan cagta wilapäyargan Läzaruta cawarisimushganta.
43012019	Jesusman asca runacuna criyiyashganta ricarmi fariseo runacuna niyargan: “Cananga ¿imatatä rurashun? ¡Lapan runacunami payman criyiycäyan!”
43012020	Pascua captinmi may-say nacioncunapitapis Jerusalenman aywayargan mana Israel runacunapis.
43012021	Paycunapita waquin runacunami Felipita ruwacuyargan: “Jesusta reguiycasiyälämay, taytay” nir. (Felipega cargan Galilea provinciacho Betsaida marcapitami.)
43012022	Sayno manacuyaptinmi Felipe aywaycur Andresta wilargan. Nircurnami ishcan aywaycur Jesusta wilayargan mana Israel runacuna paywan tincuyta munaycäyashganta.
43012023	Wilayaptinmi Jesús nergan: “NOGA wanunäpä cag höra chaycämunnami.
43012024	Shumag tantyacuyay. Musyashgansinöpis trïguta murur mana pampashgaga manami winamunsu. Pampashgami isanga winamur ali wayun. Saynölami noga mana wanuptë pipis salvacongasu. Wanuptëmi isanga asca runacuna salvacuyangapä.
43012025	“Tayta Diosta cäsucunanpa trucan quiquin munashganno cawacuyta munagcunaga manami pipis gloriaman chäyangasu. Tayta Dios munashganno cawag cagcunami isanga gloriaman char imayyagpis cawayangapä.
43012026	Mayganpis discïpulö cayta munag cäga noga cawashgäno cawasun. Imano nacarpis mana ajayaypa gatiräyämäsun. Sayno gatirämagcunataga Taytä cushishgami chasquengapä.
43012027	“Fiyupa laquicuymi sarimash. Sayno laquish caycarpis manami Taytäta manacömansu wanuypita sapämänanpä. Sayno wanunäpämi cay pasaman shamushcä.”
43012028	Sayno nishpanmi Tayta Diosta manacorgan: “Munayyog cashgayquita runacuna tantyacuyänanpä gam munashgayquino lapanpis cayculäsun, papá.” Sayno manacuptinmi ciëlupita Tayta Dios nimorgan: “Manacamashgayquita imaypis rurashgänölami cananpis rurashä.”
43012029	Sayta wiyarmi saycho cag waquin runacuna: “¡Magacuymi cash!” niyargan. Waquinnami: “¡Angilmi parlamush!” niyargan.
43012030	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Manami gamcuna niyashgayquinösu caycan. Tayta Diosmi sayno parlamush nogaman yäracayämänayquipä.
43012031	Runacunata Tayta Diosninsi juzgananpä cag höra chaycämunnami. Saynömi runacunata munaynincho sararag diablupis vincish cananpä höran chämongana.
43012032	Saymi cruci camashganpita cawarircamur Israel runacunata y mana Israel runacunatapis tantyasishä nogaman yäracayämänanpä.”
43012033	Sayno nirmi Jesús tantyasergan cruci caypa wanusish cananpä cashganta.
43012034	Saymi runacuna niyargan: “Tayta Diosninsipa palabranchöga nican salvamagninsi Cristo imayyagpis cawananpä cashgantami. Sayno nicaptenga ¿imanirtä nicanqui wanunayquipä cashganta? Sayno captenga ¿rasunpacu Cristo caycanqui?”
43012035	Sayno niyaptinmi Jesús nergan: “Au, Tayta Dios cachamashgan Cristumi caycä. Sayno captinpis walca junaglanami gamcunawan cashäpä. Saymi gamcunawan caycashgäyag jusayquicunata cacharir yachasishgäcunata chasquicuyänayqui. Chasquicorga wanusimaptinpis Tayta Diospa naupanman chäyanquipä. Jusayquicunata mana cacharerga manami imanöpapis paypa naupanman chäyanquipäsu.
43012036	Sayno caycaptenga yachasishgäcunata chasquicuyay. Saynöpami gamcunapis Tayta Diospa wamrancuna cayanquipä.” Sayno nircurmi Jesús aywacorgan. Sayno aywacuptinnami runacuna musyayargansu maypa aywacushgantapis.
43012037	Asca milagrucunata Jesús ruraycashganta ricarpis runacuna manami criyiyargansu Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta.
43012038	Sayno mana criyiyänanpä cashganpitami Tayta Diosninsipa profëtan Isaías unay cayno guelgargan: “Tayta Dios, wilacuyniquita wilacuptëpis runacuna manami chasquicuyansu. Milagrucunata ricarpis manami criyiyansu.”
43012039	Mastapis paycunapä Isaías caynömi guelgargan:
43012040	“Tayta Diosmi yarpayninta upatacäsergan wilacuyninta mana tantyayänanpä. Saynömi shonguntapis chucruyäsergan payman mana yäracuyänanpä. Saymi payta chasquicuyansu jusalicuyashganpita perdonash cayänanpä.”
43012041	Isaías sayno guelgargan runacuna Jesusta mana chasquicuyänanpä cashganta musyarmi. Paytami Tayta Diosninsi ricasergan Jesucristo gloriacho munayyog caycagta.
43012042	Jesucristuta waquin Israel runacuna mana chasquicuyaptinpis waquin cag Israel runacunami isanga criyiyargan Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta. Saynölami Israel autoridäcunapis waquenga criyiyargan Tayta Dios cachamushgan Cristo cashganta. Sayno criyiycarpis sinagogapita fariseo autoridäcuna gargunanta mansacuyashpanmi Jesusman yäracuyashganta wilacuyargansu.
43012043	Tayta Diospita ali ricash cayänanpa trucanga paycunaga más munayargan runacunalapita ali ricash caytami.
43012044	Saypitana fuertipa Jesús nergan: “Nogata chasquicamag cäga cachamagnë Taytätapis chasquicuycanmi.
43012045	Saynöpis nogata reguimag cäga cachamagnë Taytätapis reguiycanmi.
43012046	Chasquicamagcuna Tayta Diosta reguir sacäpacushno mana cayänanpämi cay pasaman shamushcä. Saymi runacunapä noga acsino caycä.
43012047	“Manami runacunata juzganäpäsu cay pasaman shamushcä, sinöga jusancunata perdonar salvanäpämi. Sayno captinpis nishgäcunata mana cäsucamagcunaga manami perdonashgasu cayanga, sinöga juicio nalcho in ernuman gaycushmi cayangapä.
43012049	“Manami quiquiläpa yarpayläpitasu wilacuycä, sinöga Taytä nimashgancunalatami wilacuycä. Paymi imata wilacunäpäpis tantyasimash.
43012050	Sayno wilacuptëmi runacuna chasquicur gloriaman chäyangapä. Saymi Taytä nimashgannöla imaypis wilacuycä.”
43013001	Jesusga musyarganmi paypa munayninman lapantapis Tayta Dios churamushganta. Saynöpis musyarganmi cay pasapita taytan cagman cuticunanpä caycashganta. Saymi Pascua galaycunanpäna caycaptin discïpuluncunawan merendananpä shuntacäyargan. Saypäga Simonpa surin Judas Iscariotita Satanás maynami yarpayninman churashganna cash autoridäcunaman Jesusta entregananpä. Discïpuluncunawan Jesús merendaycashganchömi mësapita sharcurcur janan cag mödananta jorgorgan. Nircurna discïpuluncunata cuyashganta tantyasinanpä toällata seglanman watacurcur paycunapa chaquincunata maylapargan. Maylaparcurnami toällawan chaquincunata saquisipargan.
43013006	Chaquinta maylapänanpä caycaptinmi Simón Pedro nergan: “Taytay, ¿imanöpatä gamga chaquëta maylapaycamanquiman?”
43013007	Sayno niptinmi Jesús nergan: “Gam manami tantyanquisu imanir maylapänäpä cashgantapis. Nircurrämi tantyanquipä.”
43013008	Saymi Pedro nergan: “Imano captinpis chaquëta manami maylapämanquimansu, taytay.” Sayno niptinmi Jesús nergan: “Chaquiquita mana maylapaptëga manami discïpulö canquimansu.”
43013009	Niptinmi nergan: “Sayno captenga maquëtapis y umätapis maylapaycalämay, taytay.”
43013010	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Sayrä armacushcunapaga chaquilanmi maylaypä caycan. Sayrä armacushcuna limpio cashgannömi jusalicuyashgayquipita perdonashgana car limpiuna caycäyanqui. Jucniquimi isanga jusancunata mana cacharishpan armacönino caycan.”
43013011	Sayno nergan juc discïpulun payta entregananpä cashganta musyarmi.
43013012	Discïpuluncunapa chaquinta maylapayta ushasquirnami jorgushgan mödananta jaticurcur mësa cagman yapay jamacorgan. Nircurnami nergan: “¿Tantyayanquicu imanir chaquiquicunata maylapashgätapis?
43013013	Yachasicog caycar chaquiquicunata maylapaycaptëga gamcunapis ricacayämashgayquinöla chaquiquicunata jucniqui jucniquipis maylapänacuyay.
43013015	Ashmaynöla sayno rurashcä ricacamar gamcunapis ashmaynöla cayänayquipämi.
43013016	Musyashgansinöpis ashmayga manami patronninpita más munayyogsu caycan. Saynölami cacha aywagpis cachagninpita más munayyogsu caycan.
43013017	Sayno captenga yäsishgänöla yanapänacorga cushishmi cawayanquipä.
43013018	“Manami lapayquipäsu sayno nicä. Noga musyämi maygayquicuna entregamänayquipä cashganta. Tayta Diospa palabranchöpis sayno cananpämi cayno guelgaraycan: ‘Nogawan micog cagmi conträ sharcush.’ Say guelgaraycashganga cumplengami.
43013019	Say guelgaraycashganno manarä päsaptinmi gamcunata wilapaycä sayno cananpä cashganta. Saymi nishgänöla päsaptin musyayanquipä Tayta Dios cachamashgan Cristo cashgäta.
43013020	Cachashgäcunata chasquicogcunaga nogatami chasquicaycäyäman. Saymi nogata chasquicamag cäga Taytätapis chasquicuycäyan.”
43013021	Sayno nircurmi Jesús yupa laquicushpan nergan: “Gamcunapitami jucniqui chiquimagnëcunapa maquinman entregamanquipä.”
43013022	Jesús sayno niptinmi discïpuluncuna jucninpis jucninpis ricapänacuyargan mayganpä nicashgantapis mana musyayashpan.
43013023	Saychömi Jesuspa cuyay discïpulun paypa naupancho weguraycargan.
43013024	Paytami Simón Pedro sëñargan mayganpä parlaycashgantapis Jesusta tapunanpä.
43013025	Saymi taporgan: “¿Maygantä entregashogniqui caycan, taytay?” nir.
43013026	Sayno tapuptinmi payta Jesús nergan: “Sayga caycan tantata ushmarcasir macyashgä cagmi.” Sayno nirmi tantata ushmarcasir aptapargan Simonpa surin Judas Iscariotita.
43013027	Say tantata chasquircuptinmi payman Satanás yaycorgan. Nircurnami Jesús nergan: “Ruranayquipä cagtaga jucla ruray.”
43013028	Sayno niptinpis manami discïpuluncuna tantyayargansu imanir sayno nicashgantapis.
43013029	Gastuncunapä guellayta puriseg captinmi waquin yarpäyargan merendapä rantipacamog Jesús cachaycashganta. Waquin discïpuluncunami yarpäyargan muchogcunata yanapänanpä cachaycashganta.
43013030	Tantata chasquircurnami Judas jucla aywargan yarpashganno rurananpä. Sayga cargan pasa sacaycaptinnami.
43013031	Judas yargusquiptinnami Jesús discïpuluncunata nergan: “Hörä chaycämunnami NOGA wanunäpä y nircur cawarimunäpäpis. Saynöpami runacuna tantyayanga noga pï cashgäta y Tayta Dios munayyog cashgantapis.
43013033	“Cuyay wamräno cagcuna, gamcunapita aywacunäpänami caycä. Autoridäninsicunata nishgänölami gamcunatapis nicä: Nogata ashimarpis manami tariyämanquipäsu. Gamcunaga aywashgä cagman manarämi chäyanquipäräsu.
43013034	“Aywacuptëpis jucniqui jucniqui cuyanacuyanqui noga gamcunata cuyashgänöla. Say nishgäga mushog mandamientumi gamcunapä caycan.
43013035	Nishgänöla cuyanacuyaptiquimi pï-maypis tantyayanga discïpulöcuna cayashgayquita.”
43013036	Sayno niptinmi Simón Pedro taporgan: “¿Maypatä aywacunquipä, taytay?” nir. Sayno tapuptin Jesús nergan: “Noga aywashgä cagmanga manarämi aywayanquipäräsu. Nircurnami isanga aywanquipä.”
43013037	Saynami Pedro taporgan: “¿Imanirtä gamwan aywämansu, taytay? Gam-raycu wanunäpäpis nogaga listumi caycä.”
43013038	Saymi Jesús nergan: “¿Rasunpacu noga-raycu wanunayquipä listu caycanqui? Sayno nirpis cacash manarä cantaptinmi reguimashgayquitapis quimsa cuti ñëgamanquipä.”
43014001	“Ama laquicuyaysu. Saypa trucanga Tayta Diosman yäracuyay. Saynöla nogamanpis yäracayämay.
43014002	Taytä cashgan cagchöga ascami wayicuna caycan täyänayquipä. Saymanmi aywashä alistacamunäpä. Say wayicuna mana captenga manami: ‘Alistacog aywashä’ nëmansu.
43014003	Alistarcamurnami cutimushä gamcunata pushanäpä. Saynöpami noga tashgä cagcho gamcunapis täyanquipä.
43014004	Gamcuna musyayanquimi mayman aywanäpä cashgantapis. Saynöpis musyanquimi maygan nänipa sayman chäyänayquipä cashgantapis.”
43014005	Sayno niptinmi Tomás nergan: “Mayman aywanayquipä cashgantapis mana musyaycarga ¿imanöpatä musyayäman maygan nänipa aywayänäpä cashgantapis, taytay?”
43014006	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Nogami nänega caycä. Saynöpis nogapa wilacuynëga rasun cagmi caycan. Nogami runacunapä ali cawayta apamushcä. Saymi nogata mana chasquicamarga Taytä cashgan cagman mana pipis changapäsu.
43014007	Nogata reguimag cäga Taytätapis reguinmi. Saymi cananpitaga musyayanquina Taytä imano cashgantapis.”
43014008	Saymi Felipe nergan: “Nogaga manarämi reguëräsu. Tayta Diosta reguiycasilämay nogapis reguinäpä.”
43014009	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Naupapitana gamcunawan caycaptëga ¿manacu cananyag reguiyämanquirä? Reguimag cäga Tayta Diostapis reguinmi. Reguiycämarga ¿imanirtä manacamanqui Tayta Diosta reguisinäpä?
43014010	¿Manacu criyinqui Tayta Dios nogawan caycashganta y nogapis paywan caycashgäta? Saymi imatapis parlarga pay munashgannöla parlaycä.
43014011	Tayta Dioswan noga caycashgäta y paypis nogawan caycashganta nicaptëga criyiyämänayqui. Nishgäcunata mana criyirpis milagro rurashgäcunata ricaycarga tantyacuyay rasun cagta nicashgäta.
43014012	“Wanushgäpita cawarircamur Taytä cagman cuticuptëmi chasquicamagcunaga noga rurashgäno milagruta rurayangapä. Sayno milagruta rurayaptinmi más asca runacuna tantyacur nogata chasquicayämanga.
43014013	Nogapa jutëcho Taytäta manacuptiquega manacushgayquita rurashämi. Sayno rurashä may-saychöpis Tayta Dios alabash cananpämi.
43014014	Nogapa jutëcho manacuptiquega imatapis rurashämi.
43014015	“Nogata cuyamarga lapan nishgäcunata cäsucuyay.
43014016	Tayta Diostami manacushä Santu Espirituta gamcunaman cachamunanpä. Paynami imayyagpis gamcunawan caycanga yanapäyäshunayquipä.
43014017	Tayta Diosta mana cäsucogcunaga Santu Espirituta manami chasquicuyangasu. Paycunaga manami tantyayansu Santu Espíritu cashgantapis. Gamcunami isanga nogawan purir tantyanqui Santu Espíritu cashganta. Santu Espíritu shamurnami gamcunawan imayyagpis cangapä.
43014018	“Ama yarpäyaysu manana tincunansipä cashgantaga, sinöga wanushgäpita cawarircamuptë yapaymi tincushunpä. Tayta Diosta mana cäsucogcunaga mananami ricayämanganasu. Noga wanurpis cawarimushgänölami gamcunapis cawariyämunquipä.
43014020	Say hörami tantyayanquipä Tayta Dioswan caycashgäta y gamcunawan caycashgätapis.
43014021	“Nishgäcunata cäsucog cäga rasunpaypami cuyaman. Paytaga Taytäpis y nogapis cuyashämi. Saynöpis tantyasishämi imaypis paywan caycashgäta.”
43014022	Sayno niptinmi Santiagupa surin cag Judas taporgan: “Nogacunawan canayquipä caycaptenga ¿imanirtä waquin runacunawanpis canquipäsu?”
43014023	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Pipis cuyamarga nishgäcunata cäsucamanmi. Cuyamar cäsucamagcunatami Taytäwan noga cuyashä. Saymi cawarircamur paycunawan imayyagpis cashä. Saynölami Taytäpis paycunawan cangapä.
43014024	Nogata mana cuyamag cäga manami nishgäcunata cäsucunsu. Y noga nishgäcunaga manami quiquëpa yarpayläpitasu caycan, sinöga cachamagnë Taytäpitami.
43014025	“Lapan caycunata nicä gamcunawan caycashgäyagmi.
43014026	Aywacuptënami Tayta Dios nogapa trucä gamcunaman Santu Espirituta cachamonga. Paymi lapan yachasishgäcunata yarpäsiyäshunquipä y tantyasiyäshunquipäpis.
43014027	“Gamcunapita aywacuptë ama laquicuyaysu ni mansacäyaysu. Aywacurpis yanapaycäshayquimi ima päsashuptiquipis tranquïlo cawayänayquipä. Noga yanapashgänöga manami pipis yanapäyäshunquipäsu.
43014028	Gamcunata nishcänami aywacurpis cutimunäpä cashganta. Lapanpäpis munayyog Taytä cagman aywacuptë ama laquicunquisu. Rasunpaypa cuyamarga laquicuyänayquipa trucanga cushicuyay.
43014029	Gamcunata sayno wilapaycä manarä aywacurmi. Aywacuptënami musyayanquipä nishgäcuna rasunpaypa cashganta.
43014030	“Satanás yarpäsishganta rurar prësu sarimänanpä cag runacuna shayämonganami. Saymi gamcunawan parlanäpä tiempo canganasu. Satanasga imata ruramänanpäpis manami munayyogsu caycan.
43014031	Sayno caycaptinpis Taytäta cuyar cäsucushgäta lapan runacuna musyayänanpämi pay nimashgannöla lapantapis cumplishä. Acu, caypita aywacushunna.”
43015001	Saypitanami Jesús nergan: “Nogaga caycä üvapa guerunnömi. Taytänami caycan üva uryagno.
43015002	Nogaman yäracamagcuna üvapa rämancunanömi caycäyan. Saymi maygan rämapis mana wayuptenga Taytä muturiycun. Wayog cagtami isanga Taytä shumag rämapan más wayunanpä.
43015003	Üvata rämapaptin limpio cashgannömi gamcunapis nishgäcunata chasquicur jusayquicunapita limpiuna caycäyanqui.
43015004	“Ima rämapis gueruncho mana carga manami wayunsu. Saynölami gamcunapis nogaman mana yäracayämaptiquega Tayta Diosninsi yanapäyäshunquipäsu pay munashganno cawayänayquipä. Sayno caycaptenga nogaman yäracayämashpayqui imaypis cawayay. Sayno yäracayämaptiquega gamcunawanmi imaypis caycäshäpä.
43015005	“Noga caycä üvapa guerunnömi. Gamcunanami rämäcunano caycäyanqui. Saymi cäsucayämarga üva ali wayushganno gamcunapis alita rurar cawayanquipä. Mana cäsucamarga manami imanöpapis Tayta Dios munashganno cawayanquipäsu.
43015006	Pipis mana cäsucamag cäga guerunpita mutush rämanömi canga. Saynöpis say mutush rämata shuntarcur rupasish cashgannömi rupasish cangapä.
43015007	“Nogapa munaynëcho cawayashpayqui yachasishgäcunata imaypis cumpliyaptiquega Tayta Diosninsi imata manacuyashgayquitapis wiyayäshunquipämi.
43015008	Noga munashgäno cawashpayquimi rasunpaypa discïpulöcuna caycäyanqui. Sayno cawayaptiquimi runacuna tantyacuyashpan Tayta Diosta chasquicuyangapä.
43015009	“Taytä cuyamashgannömi nogapis gamcunata cuyä. Sayno cuyaycaptëga imaypis cäsucamar cawayay.
43015010	Nishgäcunata cäsucayämaptiquega imaypis cuyashayquimi. Saynölami nimashgancunata cäsucuptë nogatapis Taytä cuyaman.
43015011	Gamcunata sayno nicä noga cushish cawashgäno gamcunapis cushish cawayänayquipämi.
43015012	“Nishgäcunata cäsucayämashpayquega jucniqui jucniquipis cuyanacuyay gamcunata noga cuyashgäno.
43015013	Cuyashgansi runataga ima päsaptinpis wanuy cawaymi yanapansi.
43015014	Lapan nishgäcunata cäsucayämaptiquega gamcunatapis wanuy cawaymi yanapäshayqui.
43015015	Ashmaytaga manami patronnin wilapansu imata yarpashgantapis. Gamcunata cuyarmi Taytä nimashgancunata lapanta wilapashcä.
43015016	“Manami acrayämashgayquipitasu cuyä, sinöga gamcunata noga acrashgäpitami. Saymi gamcunata cachaycä Tayta Diosninsipa wilacuyninta wilacuptiqui runacuna salvacionta tariyänanpä. Wilacuyaptiqui yanapäyäshunayquipäga nogapa jutëcho Taytäta manacuyanqui. Manacuyaptiquega yanapäyäshunquipämi.
43015017	Sayno caycaptenga jucniqui jucniquipis cuyanacur cawayay.
43015018	“Runacuna chiquiyäshuptiquega ama laquicuyaysu. Nogata chiquiyämashgannölami gamcunatapis chiquiyäshunquipä.
43015019	Paycunano jusalicur cawayaptiquimi isanga cuyayäshunquiman. Chiquiyäshuptiquipis Tayta Dios munashganno cawayänayquipämi gamcunata acrashcä.
43015020	“ ‘Ashmayga manami patronninpita más munayyogsu’ nishgänölami cananpis gamcunata në: Patronta chiqueg cäga ashmaynincunatapis chiquinmi. Saynölami nogata chiquimag cäga gamcunatapis chiquiyäshunquipä, y nogata chasquicamag cäga gamcunatapis chasquicuyäshunquipämi.
43015021	Runacuna chiquiyäshunquipä discïpulöcuna cayashgayquipitami. Paycunaga cachamagnë Taytä nishgancunata manami cäsucuyansu.
43015022	“Tayta Diosninsipa wilacuyninta wilacur y pipis mana rurashgan milagrucunata rurarmi runacunata tantyasishcä pay cachamashganta. Sayno tantyaycäsiptëpis runacunaga chiquimarmi jusayog caycäyan. Mayganpis nogata chiquimag cäga Taytätapis chiquiycanmi.
43015025	Tayta Diosninsipa palabranchöpis caynömi nican: ‘Jusaynag caycaptëpis runacuna chiquiyämashmi.’ Say guelgarashgannölami lapanpis cumplicaycan.
43015026	“Gamcunamanmi Taytä cagpita Santu Espirituta cachamushä imaypis yanapäyäshunayquipä. Saynöpis paymi nogapita tantyasiyäshunqui.
43015027	Gamcunapis nogawan imaypis purish caycarga nogapita runacunata tantyasiyay.
43016001	“Say lapanta gamcunata nicä runacuna chiquiyäshuptiquipis nogaman imaypis yäracayämänayquipämi.
43016002	Chiquiyäshushpayquimi sinagogapitapis garguyäshunquipä. Saynöpis Tayta Dios munashganta ruraycashganta yarparmi wanusiyäshunquipä.
43016003	Sayno rurayäshunquipä nogata ni Taytätapis mana chasquicayämarmi.
43016004	Sayno päsayäshuptiqui yarpäyay nishgänöla lapanpis cumpliycashganta. Naupataga gamcunata manami wilargäräsu sayno päsayäshunayquipä cashganta. Aywacunäpä carnami chiquish cayänayquipä cashganta wilaycä.
43016005	“Cananga Taytä cagman cuticunäpänami caycä. Sayno captinpis: ‘¿Maypatä aywanqui?’ nir tapumänayquipa trucanga ¿imanirtä laquish caycäyanqui?
43016007	Ama laquicuyaysu. Aywacurpis Santu Espiritutami cachamushä gamcunawan cananpä. Mana aywacuptëga manami Santu Espíritu shamongasu.
43016008	Pay shamurnami runacunata tantyasenga jusayog cayashganta, Tayta Diosta mana cäsucog cayashganta y jusalicushganpita juzgash cayänanpä cayashgantapis.
43016009	Jusayog cayashgantaga Santu Espíritu tantyasenga nogata mana chasquicayämaptinmi.
43016010	Tayta Diosta mana cäsucog cashgantaga Santu Espíritu tantyasenga Taytä cagman cuticuptënami.
43016011	Runacunata Tayta Dios juzgananpä cashganta Santu Espíritu tantyasenga Satanás vincishgana captinmi.
43016012	“Ascarämi caycan gamcunata yachasinäpä. Sayno captinpis manami lapantaga yachasishayquiräsu. Lapanta yachasiptëga manami yarpäyanquipäsu.
43016013	Santu Espíritu shamurnami mana yachasishgä cagcunata tantyasiyäshunquipä. Saynölami tantyasiyäshunquipä ima päsananpä cagcunatapis.
43016014	Santu Espíritu nogapita sayno tantyasiyäshunquipä noga alabash canäta munarmi.
43016015	Taytäpa maquincho cagcunaga maquëchömi caycäyan. Sayno captinmi nishcä Santu Espíritu nogapita tantyasishunayquipä cashganta.
43016016	“Más rätutaga nogata manami ricayämanquipänasu. Saypita waraynincunaga yapaymi gamcuna ricayämanquipä.”
43016017	Sayno niptin discïpuluncuna jucninpis jucninpis niyargan: “Sayno nishpan ¿imatarä nicämansi? ¿Imanirrä nimansi: ‘Más rätutaga manami ricamanquipänasu’? Y nircorga ¿imanirrä nican: ‘Saypita waraynincunaga yapaymi ricayämanquipä’? Saynöpis ¿imanirrä: ‘Taytä cagman aywacushämi’ nicämansi?
43016018	¿Imaypitarä payta ricashunsu? Manami tantyansisu imapita parlaycashgantapis.”
43016019	Discïpuluncuna sayno yarpachacuyashganta musyarmi Jesús nergan: “¿‘Más rätutaga manami ricayämanquipänasu’ y ‘Saypita waraynincunaga yapaymi ricayämanquipä’ nishgäpitacu gamcuna yarpachacuycäyanqui?
43016020	Aywacuptë waquin cushicuptinpis gamcunaga laquicuyashpayqui wagayanquipämi. Sayno laquicurpis nircorga cushicuyanquipämi.
43016021	Musyansimi wachay nanay sariptin warmicuna laquicuyashganta. Yuripacurirnami isanga cushicur manana yarpäyannasu nanaywan nacashgantapis.
43016022	Saynölami gamcuna canan laquicurpis yapay tincushga cushicuyanquipä. Say cushicuyashgayquitaga ima päsashuptiquipis manami gongäyanquipäsu.
43016023	Yapay tincushgaga mananami tapuyämanquipänasu imanir sayno parlashgätapis. “Shumag tantyacuyay. Nogapa jutëcho manacuyaptiquega Taytä wiyashunquipämi.
43016024	Naupataga Taytäta manacurpis manami jutëchösu manacuyashcanqui. Cananpitaga nogapa jutëcho Taytäta imatapis manacuyay. Manacuyaptiquega manacuyashgayquita wiyashunquipämi. Manacuyashgayquita wiyaptinmi cushicuyanquipä.
43016025	“Gamcunata cananyag imamanpis tincusiypa yachasiptë manami shumag tantyayämashcanquisu. Nircurmi isanga gamcunata yachasishayqui imamanpis mana tincusiylapana. Sayno yachasiptëmi isanga lapan nishgäcunatapis tantyayanquipä.
43016026	Yachasishgäcunata tantyacurnami nogapa jutëchöna Tayta Diosta manacuyanquipä. Saymi shuyarangasu nogarä gamcunapä manacunäta, sinöga gamcuna manacuyashgayquitapis wiyashunquipämi.
43016027	Tayta Diosninsega gamcunata cuyayäshunquimi. Sayno cuyayäshunqui paypita shamushgäta criyir cuyayämaptiquimi.
43016028	Taytäpa naupanpitami cay pasaman noga shamushcä. Saynölami Taytäpa naupanman cuticushäpä.”
43016029	Sayno niptinmi discïpuluncuna niyargan: “¡Cananmi isanga niyämashgayquicunata tantyayä! Mananami tumasipaylapanasu parlapaycäyämanqui.
43016030	Saynöpami musyayä gam lapanta musyashgayquita. Tantyasiyämänayquipä mana manacuyaptëpis tantyaycäsiyämanquimi. Saymi Tayta Diospa naupanpita shamushgayquita criyiyä.”
43016031	Saymi Jesús nergan: “¿Rasunpacu criyiycäyämanqui?
43016032	Cananga höra chämushganami japaläta cachariycamar wacpa caypa aywacuyänayquipä. Sayno cachariyämaptiquipis manami japaläsu caycäshä, sinöga Taytäwanmi cashäpä.
43016033	“Gamcunata sayno nicä runacuna chiquiyäshuptiquipis mana ajayaypa imaypis yäracayämänayquipämi. Cay pasacho cayashgayquiyäga nacayanquirämi. Nogapis nacar gamcuna-raycu wanurmi Satanasta vincishäpä. Sayno captenga cay pasacho nacarpis ama laquicuyaysu.”
43017001	Saypitanami junagpa nuquircur Tayta Diosta Jesús manacorgan: “Wanunäpä cag hörä chaycämunnami, papá. Wanuptëpis cawariycasilämay munayyog cashgayquita runacuna tantyayänanpä.
43017002	Gammi lapan runacunapäpis munayyog canäpä churamashcanqui. Saynöpis churamashcanqui acrashgayqui cagcunata perdonar salvanäpämi.
43017003	Salvashgana car gloriaman charmi reguishushpayqui gam japalayqui Dios cashgayquita musyayangapä, papá. Saynölami naupayquicho caycagta ricamashpan cay pasaman cachamashgayquitapis musyayangapä.
43017004	“Lapan shongöwanmi nimashgayquicunata cay pasacho cumplishcä.
43017005	Cay pasata manarä camar naupayquicho munayyog cashgäno cananpis munayyog canäpä pushacalämayna, papá.
43017006	“Saynölami discïpulöcunapäpis gamta manacamö, papá. Paycunataga acrashcanqui maquëcho cawayänanpämi. Saymi paycunaga wilacuyniquita yachasiptë chasquicuyash.
43017007	Sayno chasquicurmi cananga musyayanna lapan yachasishgäcuna gam munashgayquinöla cashganta. Saynöpis yachasishgäta chasquicurmi tantyayash gam cachamashgayquita.
43017009	Discïpulöcunapä manacamur manami lapan runacunapäsu manacamö, sinöga maquëman churamushgayqui cagcunalapämi.
43017010	Nogapa maquëcho carga gampa maquiquichöpis caycanmi, papá. Paycunaga tantyacuyashmi gam cachamashgayquita.
43017011	“Nogaga gampa naupayquimanna shacamur manami cay pasacho cashäpänasu. Paycunami isanga cay pasacho caycangarä. Saymi paycunapä gamta manacamö imaypis yachasishgänöla cawayänanpä. Saynöpami nogansi say yarpayla cashgansino paycunapis cuyanacur say yarpayla cayangapä.
43017012	Cay pasacho cashpä maquëman churamushgayqui cagcunataga lapantami shumag ricashcä. Sayno ricaptëmi mayganpis nogaman yäracamashganpita witicushgasu. Jucmi isanga Satanás munashganta rurar witicush. Pay witicunanpäga palabrayquicho maynami guelgaraycash.
43017013	“Gampa naupayquiman cutimunäpä captinmi cushish caycä, papá. Saymi discïpulöcunapä gamta manacamö noga cushish cashgäno paycunapis cushish cawayänanpä.
43017014	Gampa wilacuyniquita paycunata maynami wilapashcä. Sayta cäsucur manami waquin runacunanönasu cawaycäyan, sinöga noga cawashgänönami cawaycäyan. Sayno cawayaptinmi runacuna paycunata chiquiyan.
43017015	Runacuna chiquiyaptinpis manami cay pasapita jucla pushacunayquipäsu gamta manacamö, sinöga cay pasacho cayashganyag Satanaspita sapaycunayquipämi.
43017016	Imano captinpis naupayquicho cawanäpä cashgannömi paycunapis naupayquicho cawayänanpä caycäyan.
43017017	“Wilacuyniquita wilapashgäta paycunata shumag yarpaycasilay, papá. Wilacuyniquita yarpäyashpanmi gam munashgayquino shumag cawayangapä.
43017018	Wilacunäpä cachamashgayquinölami paycunatapis noga cachaycä ali wilacuyniquita wilacuyänanpä.
43017019	Munashgayquino paycuna cawayänanpämi nogapis wilacuyniqui nishgannöla cawaycä.
43017020	“Manami paycunalapäsu gamta manacamö, sinöga paycuna wilacuyashganta chasquicogcunapäpis manacamömi.
43017021	Nogansi juc yarpayla cashgansino paycunapis juc yarpayla cayänanpämi gamta manacamö, papá. Sayno cawayashganta ricacurmi cachamashgayquita tantyar waquin runacunapis chasquicayämangapä.
43017022	Nogansi cuyanacur cawashgansino paycunapis cuyanacur cawayänanpämi wilacuyniquita yachasishcä.
43017023	Cuyanacur cawayänanpämi paycunawan imaypis caycäshä. Saynölami gampis nogawan caycanqui. Cuyanacur cawayashganta ricarmi cachamashgayquita tantyashpan waquin runacunapis chasquicayämangapä. Saynöpis tantyayanga nogata cuyamashgayquino paycunatapis cuyashgayquita.
43017024	“Lapan acrashgayqui cagcuna gloriacho nogawan canantami munä. Gloriacho carnami ricayämanga segaypa chipipiycar munayyog cashgäta. Saynömi cargä cay pasata manarä camashgapis. Sayno munayyog caycagta ricayämänantami munä, papá.
43017025	“Gam imata munashgayquitapis runacuna manami tantyayansu. Nogami isanga tantyä, gampa naupayquipita shamush car. Chasquicamagcunapis munashgayquita tantyananpämi paycunata yachasishcä. Wanushgäpita cawarircamur mastapis munashgayquita yachasishärämi. Saynöpami cuyanacushgansino paycunapis cuyanacur cawayangapä. Saycunatami gamta manacamö, papá.”
43018001	Tayta Diosta Jesús manacuyta ushasquirmi discïpuluncunawan simpäyargan Cedrón nishgan ragrata. Simpärirnami chäyargan Olivos jachacuna cashgan chacraman.
43018002	Discïpuluncunawan Jesús cadala sayman aywash captinmi Jesusta entregag cag Judas Iscariote musyargan sayman aywayashganta.
43018003	Saymi Jesuspa contran cag runacunata pushacurcur Judas sayman aywargan Jesusta entregananpä. Say runacunaga cayargan mandag cüracunawan fariseo runacuna cachayashgan wardiacuna y asca soldäducunami. Paycunami aywayargan acsincunawan y espädancunawanpis.
43018004	Prësu sarinanpä shamushganta musyaycarpis Jesús aywargan say runacunawan tincunanpä. Tincurmi taporgan: “¿Pitatä gamcuna ashiycäyanqui?” nir.
43018005	Saymi niyargan: “Nazaret marcapita cag Jesustami ashiycäyä.” Saymi Jesús nergan: “Nogami caycä.”
43018006	Jesús: “Nogami caycä” niptinmi lapan runacuna mansacaywan ancalaypa tuniyargan. Judas Iscariotipis paycunawanmi caycargan.
43018007	Jesús yapay taporgan: “¿Pitatä ashiycäyanqui?” nir. Niptinmi yapay niyargan: “Nazaret marcapita cag Jesustami ashiycäyä.”
43018008	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Maynami nishcä noga cashgäta. Nogata ashimarga nogalata prësu apayämay. Discïpulöcunataga ama sariyaysu.”
43018009	Sayno päsananpämi discïpuluncunapä mayna nergan: “Discïpulöcunataga shumagmi ricashcä nogaman yäracamashganpita mayganpis mana witicuyänanpä.”
43018010	Saymi Simón Pedro espädanta jorgurir juc runapa derëcha cag rinrinta waluriycorgan. Say runa cargan más mandag cürapa ashmayninmi. Paypa jutinmi cargan Malco.
43018011	Sayno ruraptinmi Pedruta Jesús nergan: “¡Espädayquita cutisiy churaräcunanman! Wanunäta Taytä munaptenga listumi caycä wanunäpäpis.”
43018012	Nircurnami Jesusta liyarcur lapan soldäducuna mandagninwan y wardiacunapis payta apayargan.
43018013	Nircurnami chäsiyargan Anaspa wayinman. Anasga cargan Caifaspa suedrunmi. Caifasga cargan más mandag cürami.
43018014	Autoridä mayincunata Caifasga maynami nergan: “Say runala wanusun lapansi salvacunansipä.”
43018015	Simón Pedruwan jucag discïpulunmi Jesusta gatiräyargan caru guepalanta. Jucag discïpulunmi más mandag cürawan reguinacuyash car sawan rurinman yaycorgan Jesuspa guepanta.
43018016	Pedroga quëdacuycorgan punculachömi. Saymi puncucho cuidag warmita más mandag cürawan reguinacog discïpuloga ruwacorgan Pedrutapis ruriman yaycasinanpä.
43018017	Saymi puncucho cuidag warmi Pedruta taporgan: “¿Manacu gampis say runapa discïpulun caycanqui?” Saymi Pedro nergan: “Manami nogaga paypa discïpulunsu cä.”
43018018	Saypitanami yupa alaptin ninata sarircasir mashacuycäyargan ashmaycuna y templo täpag wardiacunapis. Saychömi Pedrupis paycunawan mashacuycargan.
43018019	Saypitanami Jesusta Anás taporgan discïpuluncuna pï cashganta y imata yachasishgantapis.
43018020	Saymi Jesús nergan: “¿Imanirtä sayno tapumanqui? Nogaga manami imatapis pacaylapaga yachasishcäsu. Sinagogacunacho y templuchöpis yachasiptë lapan runacunami wiyamash. Yachasishgäta wiyamag runacunata tapumuy. Paycunami musyayan imata yachasishgätapis.”
43018022	Sayno niptinmi juc wardia Jesusta lagyaycorgan: “¿Imanirtä más mandag cürata sayno ninqui?” nir.
43018023	Sayno niptinmi Jesús nergan: “¿Imatatä mana alita parlashcä? Mana alita parlash captëga mä tantyasimay. Lutanta mana parlaycaptëga ¿imanirtä lagyamanqui?”
43018024	Nircurnami liyashlata Jesusta Anás apasergan más mandag cüra Caifás cagman.
43018025	Sayyagmi Simón Pedro mashacuycargan waquin runacuna mashacuycäyashgan cagcho. Saycho mashacuycaptinmi niyargan: “¿Gampis manacu say runapa discïpulun canqui?” Saymi Pedro nergan: “Nogaga manami paypa discïpulunsu cä.”
43018026	Maylantanami más mandag cürapa ashmayninpis nergan: “Gamta paywan caycagtami ricashcä olivos jachacuna cashgan chacracho.” (Sayno neg runapa castanpa rinrintami Pedro walurish cash.)
43018027	Saymi Pedro yapay nergan: “Manami paypa discïpulunsu cä.” Sayno nicaptinmi cacash cantarcorgan.
43018028	Pasa manarä waraptinmi Caifaspa wayinpita Jesusta apayargan Pilätupa despächunman. Payga Roma autoridämi cargan. Israel autoridäcunami isanga sayman yaycuyargansu: “Roma runapa wayinman yaycorga leyninsi nishganno Pascua micuycunata manami micushunpänasu” niyashpan.
43018029	Saymi despächunpita yargurir Pilato taporgan: “¿Ima jusatatä cay runa rurash cayman apayämunayquipäga?” nir.
43018030	Sayno tapuptinmi niyargan: “Jusayog captinmi cayman apayämushcä. Jusan mana captenga manami apayämömansu cargan.”
43018031	Saymi Pilato nergan: “Noga juzganäta munarga wilayämay ima jusan cashgantapis. Sinöga, payta apacuyay leyniquicuna guelgarashganno quiquiquicuna juzgayänayquipä.” Sayno niptinmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna niyargan: “Musyashgayquinöpis nogacunaga manami munayyogsu cayä pitapis wanusiyänäpä.”
43018032	Sayno nirmi Pilätuta manacuyargan Jesusta cruzcho wanusiyänanpä. Cruzcho wanusiyaptinmi cumplergan Jesús cruci cash cananpä nishganta.
43018033	Despächunman Pilato yaycurirmi Jesusta gayaycur taporgan: “¿Rasunpacu gamga canqui Israel runacunapa mandagnin rey?” nir.
43018034	Saymi Jesús nergan: “¿Musyayta munarcu sayno tapumanqui, o Israel autoridäcuna nishuptiquicu sayno tapumanqui?”
43018035	Sayno niptin Pilato nergan: “Nogaga manami Israel runasu cä saycunata musyaycänäpäga. Marca mayiquicunawan mandag cüracunami prësu apamushushcanqui. ¿Imatatä rurashcanqui prësu apayämushunayquipä?”
43018036	Saymi Jesús nergan: “Nogaga manami cay pasacho mandagsu cä. Cay pasacho mandag captëga nogaman yäracamagcuna pelyanmanmi cargan autoridäcuna prësu mana sariyämänanpä.”
43018037	Sayno niptin Pilato taporgan: “¿Sayno captenga rasunpacu Israel runacunapa mandagnin rey caycanqui?” Saymi Jesús nergan: “Au, gam nishgayquinölami mandag rey caycä. Mandag rey canäpämi cay pasacho yurishcä. Saynöpis cay pasaman shamushcä Tayta Diosninsipa wilacuyninta wilacunäpämi. Tayta Diosninsipa wilacuyninta chasquicogcunaga nishgäcunata chasquicuyanmi.”
43018038	Sayno niptin Pilato nergan: “¿Cansuräpis manasurä Diospa wilacuynenga?” Jesusta tapurcushpan despächunpita Pilato yapay yargurir Israel runacunapa autoridänincunata nergan: “Noga manami tarësu cay runapa ima jusantapis.
43018039	Gamcunaga musyayanquimi Pascuacho juc prësuta cacharinäpä cashganta. ¿Munayanquicu Israel runacunapa mandagnin rey Jesusta cacharinäta?”
43018040	Sayno niptin niyargan: “¡Barrabasta cachariyga! ¡Jesustaga ama cachariysu!” Barrabasga cargan Romacho mandag emperadorpa contranmi.
43019001	Mana cacharinanpä niyaptinmi Pilato astasergan Jesusta.
43019002	Soldäducunami cashapita corönata rurarcur Jesuspa umanman jatipäyargan. Saynöpis puca-chiclu cäpata aylupäyargan.
43019003	Nircurnami Jesusta lagyayashpan niyargan: “¡Alabash casun Israel runacunapa mandagnin rey!”
43019004	Despächunpita Pilato yapay yargurcur nergan: “Yapaymi say runata jorgamushä jusaynag cashganta tantyayänayquipä.”
43019005	Sayno nirmi Jesusta jorgamorgan cashapita rurash corönan jatishta y puca-chiclu cäpan jatishta. Saymi Pilato nergan: “¡Ricayay cay runata!”
43019006	Jesusta ricaycurmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincunawan templo täpag wardiacunapis niyargan: “¡Cruci cash casun! ¡Cruci cash casun!” Sayno niyaptinmi Pilato nergan: “Cruci cash cananta munarga quiquiquicuna cruci cayay ima, ari. Nogaga manami ima jusantapis paypata tarësu wanusish cananpäga.”
43019007	Sayno niptinmi say autoridäcuna niyargan: “Cay runaga: ‘Diospa surinmi cä’ nishganpita wanusish casun. Sayno negcuna wanusish cayänanpämi leynëcunacho nican.”
43019008	“Diospa surinmi cä” nishganta wilayaptinmi Pilato yupa mansarergan.
43019009	Saymi despächunman cutiycur Jesusta yapay taporgan: “¿Gam maypitatä caycanqui?” nir. Sayno tapuptin Jesús manami imatapis parlacorgansu.
43019010	Saymi Pilato nergan: “Tapuycaptëga ¿manacu imatapis contestamanqui? Cruci casinäpä o cacharinäpäpis munayyog cashgäta ¿gam manacu musyanqui?”
43019011	Sayno niptin Jesús nergan: “Gampa maquiquiman Tayta Dios mana churamaptenga manami ima munayniquipis canmansu cruci casimänayquipä ni cacharimänayquipäpis. Saymi gampita más jusayog caycan maquiquiman entregamag cag runa.”
43019012	Sayno niptinmi Pilätoga cachariyta munargan. Cachariyta munaptinmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna masrä gaparäyargan: “¡Mandag-tucurmi Jesusga emperador Cesarpa contran caycan! ¡Saymi Jesusta cacharerga gampis emperador Cesarpa contran canquipä!” nir.
43019013	Sayno niyaptinmi Pilato jorgasimorgan Jesusta. Nircurnami “Gábata” nishgan alarman aywaycur mandacunan sillëtaman jamacorgan. (Hebreo idiömachöga Gábata nishganga “Läja rumicunawan rurash” ninanmi.)
43019014	Saypitami Israel runacunapa autoridänincunata nergan: “¡Mandagniqui reyta ricayay!” (Saycuna päsayargan viernes pulan junagmi. Say tardi sábado jamay junag galaycorgan.)
43019015	Saymi runacuna fuertipa niyargan: “¡Wanusish casun! ¡Wanusish casun! ¡Cruci casiy!” nir. Saymi Pilato nergan: “¿Mandagniquita cruci casinätacu munayanqui?” Saymi cürapa mandagnincuna niyargan: “¡Nogacunapa mandagnëga emperador Cesarlami! ¡Paypita juc mandagnëga manami pipis cansu!”
43019016	Sayno niyaptinmi Jesusta Pilato entregaycorgan cruci cayänanpä.
43019017	Saymi Jesusta apayargan cruzta umrurcasir “Calavëra” nishgan jircaman. (Hebreo idiömachöga Gólgota niyanmi say jircata.)
43019018	Sayman chaycasirnami Jesusta cruci cayargan. Saynömi ishcay runacunatapis cruci cayargan Jesuspa ishcan lädunman.
43019019	Saypitanami Pilato clävasergan cruzpa puntanman juc letrëruta. Say letrëruchömi cayno guelgarargan: “Nazaretpita cag Jesús, Israel runacunapa mandagnin reymi.”
43019020	Jerusalenpa cercalancho cruci cash captinmi Israel runacuna ascag liyiyargan say letrërucho guelgaraycagta. Say letrëroga guelgarargan hebreo, latín y griego idiömacunachömi.
43019021	Saymi mandag cüracuna Pilätuta niyargan:
43019022	Sayno niptin Pilato nergan: “Guelgashgäga guelgashganami caycan.”
43019023	Jesusta cruci casquirnami paypa mödananta saycho cag chuscu soldäducuna aypunacuyargan. Rurincho cag jatirashgan mödanata aypunacuyänanpämi isanga, costüraynag captin, niyargan:
43019024	“Saytaga ama rachishunsu, sinöga suertitarä jitashun maygansipis apacunansipä.” Saynöpami cumplergan Tayta Diospa palabrancho Jesuspä cayno guelgarashgan: “Suertitami jitayash mayganpis mödanäta apacunanpä.” Say nishgannölami soldäducuna rurayargan.
43019025	Cruci caraycashgan cagchömi caycargan Jesuspa maman, mamanpa nanan, Cleofaspa warmin María y María Magdalenapis.
43019026	Saymi mamanta y cuyashgan discïpulunta ricärishpan Jesús nergan: “Mamay, nogapa trucä Juannami wawayqui canga.”
43019027	Nircurnami cuyashgan discïpuluntapis nergan: “Cananga mamäta ricayculanqui mamayquitano.” Jesús sayno niptinmi say junagpitana mamanta pushacorgan wayinman.
43019028	Wanunanpä carnami Tayta Diosninsipa palabrancho guelgaraycashgan cumplinanpä Jesús nergan: “Yacunaycämi.”
43019029	Saychömi soldäducuna upuyänanpä cag pochgog vïnu caycargan wichi junta. Saymi gueru puntanman esponjata watarcur say pochgog vïnuman ushmarcasir Jesusta shogusiyta munayargan.
43019030	Say vïnuta yawarcurnami Jesús nergan: “Lapantanami cumplishcä.” Sayno nisquirnami päsarporgan.
43019031	Pascuacho sábado jamay junag galaycunanpäna caycaptinmi Israel runacunapa autoridänincuna munayargansu pipis cruci caraycar quëdayänanta. Saymi Pilätuta manacuyargan cruzcho wanuyta nacaycagcunapa chancancunata paquircur cruzpita jorgunanpä.
43019032	Saymi soldäducuna aywaycushpan Jesuspa naupancho cruci caraycag runacunapa chancancunata paquiyargan.
43019033	Jesuspa chancancunatami isanga manana paquergannasu, wanushgana caycagta tariycur.
43019034	Wanushgana caycaptinpis llapsha pachanpa Jesusta tucsergan juc soldädo. Sayno tucsiptinmi yargamorgan yawarwan yacu.
43019035	Jesuspa discïpulun carmi lapan saycunata ricargä. Saymi imano cashgantapis guelgaycä salvamagninsi Cristo cashganta gamcunapis criyiyänayquipä.
43019036	Lapan saycuna päsargan: “Manami ni juc tululanpis paquishgasu canga” nir Tayta Diosninsipa palabrancho guelgaraycashgan cumplinanpämi.
43019037	“Runacuna ricayangami tucsishganta” nir guelgaraycashganpis cumplerganmi.
43019038	Saypitami Arimatea marcapita José jutiyog runa Pilätuta manacorgan: “Jesuspa ayanta cachapaycalämay pampag apanäpä” nir. Israel autoridäcunata mansacushpanmi payga Jesusman yäracushganta wilacorgansu. Manacushganta Pilato auniptinmi Jesuspa ayanta apargan pampananpä.
43019039	Saynömi Nicodemupis paywan aywargan quimsa arröba mïrra y aloe nishganta apacurcur.
43019040	Israel runacunapa costumbrin cashgannömi say apashganta Josëwan Nicodemo säbanasman winayargan. Winarcurnami Jesuspa ayanta pituyargan pampayänanpä.
43019041	Jesusta cruci cayashgan naupanchömi cargan frütacuna plantarashgan juc huerta. Saychömi cargan pitapis manarä pampayashgan mushog sepultüra.
43019042	Sábado jamay junag galaycunanpäna captinmi say sepultüralamanna Jesusta pampayargan.
43020001	Domingo tutami María Magdalena saca sacala aywargan Jesús pamparaycashgan cagman. Sayman charmi tarergan sepultüra saparag rumi witisish caycagta.
43020002	Sayta ricaycurmi cörrila cutergan Jesús cuyashgan discïpulunta y Simón Pedruta wilananpä. Chaycurnami paycunata wilargan: “¡Jesuspa ayantami apacuyash! ¡Manami musyayäsu maypa apacuyashgantapis!”
43020003	Sayno wilaptinmi Pedruwan Jesús cuyashgan discïpulun cörrila aywayargan Jesusta pampayashgan cagman. Pedruta yalirirmi puntata jucag discípulu chargan.
43020005	Saychönami punculapita watgaycur ricargan säbanaslana jitaraycagta.
43020006	Simón Pedrumi isanga ruriman yaycorgan. Saychömi paypis säbanaslata tarergan. Jesuspa umanta watapashgan träputapis juclächo churaraycagtami tarergan.
43020008	Saypitarämi jucag discïpulunpis ruriman yaycur Jesús cawarimushganta criyergan.
